sentences.en: Abstract: : housing demand and housing adaptability, variability is not coordination problem of current our country city housing is very serious.
sentences.cn: 摘要： 当前我国城市住宅中居住需求与住宅适应性、可变性不相协调的问题十分突出。

sentences.en: Enthusiasm, adaptability, sociability, and good health are essential.
sentences.cn: 富有热情、能适应环境、善于与人交往以及身体健康都是基本的条件。

sentences.en: It has a wide range of adaptability.
MHUG process has a good adaptability to inferior gas oil.
sentences.cn: 试验表明该工艺对劣质柴油有较好的适应性.

sentences.en: Requires superior technical problem solving skills, adaptability, flexibility and high energy level.
sentences.cn: 较强解决专业问题的能力, 良好的适应 、 协调能力和充沛的精力.

sentences.en: Sensitive action , active thinking, with a certain degree of adaptability.
sentences.cn: 动作灵敏, 思维活跃, 具有一定的应变能力.

sentences.en: The adaptability and creativity is important for county - level sales companies.
sentences.cn: 阐述了县级石油公司适应能力和创造能力的重要性.

sentences.en: The adaptability is a sticking point of the workflow system.
sentences.cn: 可适应性是工作流系统能否成功应用的重要因素.

sentences.en: The adaptability of these plants was reported in the paper also.
sentences.cn: 引种以种子、播种苗和栽培苗为材料,引种总成活率为68%.

sentences.en: The adaptability of wool is one of its great attractions.
sentences.cn: 用途广泛是羊毛最具吸引力的特点之一。

sentences.en: The adaptability of youth to new surroundings is one of their good qualities.
sentences.cn: 年轻人适应新环境的能力是他们的一种优点.

sentences.en: The beauty of laws for human creatures is their adaptability to new stitchings.
sentences.cn: 人类规律的可贵之处就在于它们对新形势的适应性.

sentences.en: The core idea of CAS theory is: adaptability makes complexity.
sentences.cn: 复杂适应系统理论的核心思想就是,适应性造就复杂性.

sentences.en: The gene - base for adaptability must be increased.
sentences.cn: 适应性的基因基性必然会有所增加.

sentences.en: The method of system control has better control precision and adaptability.
sentences.cn: 研究结果表明,该方法具有较好的控制精度和适应能力.

sentences.en: We hope that positive social mechanisms that are conducive to human adaptability will play an ever more effective role in meeting the challenges of the future.
sentences.cn: 我们寄希望于积极的社会机制，以期有助于人类更加适应自然，对未来的挑战扮演一个更加积极有效的角色。

sentences.en: We will emphasize the membrane absorption technique due to its popularity and adaptability to field conditions.
sentences.cn: 我们要强调膜吸附技术,是由于它的普及性及对现场条件的适应性.

sentences.en: Where supreme adaptability is required , out-of- control swarmware is what you want .
sentences.cn: 在需要终极适应性的地方，你所需要的是不受控制的群。

sentences.en: You can achieve greater flexibility, adaptability, and independence when each layer is only loosely coupled to the layer above and below.
sentences.cn: 当每个层仅松散耦合到其上和其下的层时，您可以实现更强的灵活性、适应性和独立性。
